document_data.caption: ''Polished eye agate.''
document_data.name: Agate
document_data.mainbody: '''Agate''', the [[gem|gemstone]], came in many forms and colors, most of which were considered [[ornamental stones]] or [[hardstones]] in the ''Realms''.
document_data.Description: Agates were a form of [[chalcedony]], which made them part of a large family of gems and minerals.

Varieties.Ornamental Stones:
* [[Banded agate]]
* [[Eye agate]]
* [[Fire agate]]
* [[Frost agate]]
* [[Moss agate]]
* [[Tiger eye agate]]
